title: Amon Ducot

properties.name: description
properties.value: Amon Ducot is the author of The Theory of Transvergence[1] and Transportation incantations,[2] two books found in the Grand Library of Kourend in Arceuus.

content:
Amon Ducot is the author of The Theory of Transvergence[1] and Transportation incantations,[2] two books found in the Grand Library of Kourend in Arceuus.

In Transvergence theory, Amon studies the art of runecraft and the differences in practice between Great Kourend and the mainland.[3] He notes the strange properties of the Dark Altar, and its apparent self preservation.[4]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Transvergence theory, Old School RuneScape. "The Theory of Transvergence, by Amon Ducot." Item examine text.
  2. ^ Transportation incantations, Old School RuneScape. "Transportation Incantations, by Amon Ducot." Item examine text.
  3. ^ Transvergence theory, Old School RuneScape. "startling differences between the creation of runes both here and in other lands."
  4. ^ Transvergence theory, Old School RuneScape. "It is almost as if the Dark Altar has some sense of self preservation and is looking for as many ways as possible to be integral to our community and thus, gain power within it."
